name: Hamster-Quest
description:
Hamster Quest is a funny 3D platformer  in which you control a hamster that can make its ball appear.

This Hamster is hungry, be quick and feed it carrots!

Here is my first attemp in a Game Jam.

This Game was made in 2 Days for the MIX & GAME JAM 2020

If you enjoyed it leave a donation if you can comment and follow me on itch and on Youtube ;)
